title: Families flock to F-9 Park for Independence Day bash
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP): Islamabad’s F-9 Park turned into a hub of celebration as families gathered in large numbers for the district administration’s Independence Day programme.
The event featured performances by well-known artists and was secured by a significant police presence.
Families flocked to Islamabad’s F-9 Park to mark Independence Day with an event organized by the district administration.
The evening was filled with music and entertainment, drawing crowds from across the city.
Renowned artists Ali Safina and Sofia Anjum hosted the event, engaging the audience throughout the night. The atmosphere grew lively as up-and-coming singer Sajjad Ali took the stage, encouraging the crowd to dance along.
Security was a priority, with heavy police presence at the entrance and around the park, ensuring the event remained safe for all attendees.
As the night progressed, the celebration was set to culminate in a fireworks display at midnight, promising a memorable end to the Independence Day festivities.
